metadata.title: CVE-2015-5269 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in group/overview.php in Moodlethrough 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.10, 2.8.x before 2.8.8, and 2.9.x before2.9.2 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via a modified grouping description.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
